entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New aggregateby tests don't work with native AOT #92387
  • [browser] setModuleImports() can only be used once? #92386
  • System.Text.Json: `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull` is not working #92383
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_float_1_r/expl_float_1_r.dll #92382
    9.0.0
  • Some Merged Tests Will Never Fail or Pass Correctly Due to a Void Return Value #92381
    9.0.0
  • (Unmanaged) Strings in callbacks are not considered as blittable by WasmAppBuilder #92380
  • Regex Escape Sequence inconsistency in C# compared to C++ and VBScript #92379
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #92378
  • [Android] Add leg to test LLVM AOT tooling on Windows Hosts #92376
    9.0.0
  • Add additional `ThrowIf[CONDITION]` to more exceptions #92370
  • Pointer Type objects IsClass returning unexpected value. #92367
  • Add an option to the dotnet host to enable app-crashing exception details to be printed on a single line #92363
  • Allow `LibraryImport` `StringMarshalling.Utf8` to provide UTF-8 byte count to native code #92361
    9.0.0
  • ServerClosesConnection_ThrowsHttpProtocolException test failed with wrong exception type #92359
  • Avx2 code causes AccessViolationExceptions with AVX512 available #92357
    8.0.0
  • `ReadsWritesClosedFinish_StreamDisposed` test failures #92350
  • Incorrect value after truncating cast #92349
    8.0.0
  • [Breaking change?] Exception "Reflection-based serialization has been disabled for this application" is thrown on Mac Release #92345
    8.0.0
  • Selected apphost is not a valid PE file on s390x #92344
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory(String prefix) fails with Success exception in wasi-wasm build #92336
    9.0.0
  • JIT: IsContainableHWIntrinsicOp seems to discard many containment opportunities #92332
    9.0.0
  • Improve error message in scenaria where `JsonIgnore` is combined with `required` members. #92330
    Future
  • AggressiveOptimization makes wrong Vector256 optimization in .NET8 RC1 #92328
    8.0.0
  • Source generator for options validation leads to trimming warnings/errors in AOT #92327
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E]ASPNETCore.app runtime version for NET8 RC2 SDK is RTM. #92321

Closed

  • Config binder gen: further tighten filtering constraint for input binding method invocations #90687
    8.0.0
  • [Binder gen] To align with reflection impl, update property binding logic that handles missing config values #86333
    8.0.0
  • Config generator wrongly emits init-related exception in bind operations #90974
    8.0.0
  • How are we doing in the repo -- spot check #92377
  • ICorDebugGCReferenceEnum.Next fails to return stack references in .NET 8 preview 4 #87239
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 preview 7 and RC 1 seem to be ignoring IlcGenerateStackTraceData property #92373
  • [.NET 7]Integer auto-vectorization bug #83387
    8.0.0
  • Source generated configuration binder error #92343
  • CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory is not respected #92188
  • Will #88851 be backported to .NET Core 6 or 7? #92239
  • [wasm] CI improvements #92362
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != REG_XMM0' during 'Generate code' #91798
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #92117
    8.0.0
  • Crash w/ Data Annotations Validation - Regression in RC1 #92276
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] Expected and actual version of WASI SDK does not match. Please delete /usr/local/wasi-sdk/ folder to provision a new version. #92233
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory methods for collections in System.Collections.Generic #92133
  • Provide overloads for Enumerable.ToArray/ToList/ToHashSet for the initial capacity #91888
  • DateTimeOffset constructor returning incorrect offset on macOS & Linux #92084
    Future
  • Analyzer: Recommend upgrading to CompositeFormat for enhanced performance #85525
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Future of Numerics and AI - Provide a downlevel `System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives` class #89639
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: GetAsync_AllowedSSLVersion_Succeeds #57343
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http11.EventSource_UnsuccessfulRequest_LogsStartFailedStop #52095
    Future
  • SyncHttpHandlerTest_AutoRedirect.AllowAutoRedirect_True_ValidateNewMethodUsedOnRedirection failed with "Socket is already connected" on macOS #50271
    Future
  • A few loopback server tests are timing out in CI #30733
    Future
  • Timeout: OuterLoop SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ClientCertificates_Test.Manual_CertificateSentMatchesCertificateReceived_Success #41606
    Future
  • Outerloop ConnectTimeout_TimesOutSSLAuth_Throws intermitently fails #40798
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test.GetAsync_SupportedSSLVersion_Succeeds - www.ssllabs.com #34434
    Future
  • QuicListener.AcceptConnectionAsync rethrowing exceptions #75115
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonNumberHandling.AllowReadingEmptyStringAsDefault #92331
  • Error NETSDK1013: The TargetFramework value '' was not recognized. #92251
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36799: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #91950
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36796: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91948
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36793: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91947
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36794: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91946
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36792: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91944
    6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] A plan for amending the LoongArch64‘s port #69705
    Future
  • ./build.sh libs.native fails #92194
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide ALC name in DispatchProxy for proxies in custom ALC #92385
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Ensure Bind can handle null from GetSection #92384
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #92374
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fix the VN for xor operation #92372
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] JIT: Fix invalid containment of vector broadcasts #92371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark the ILLink test source generator as a source generator #92366
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fixes for LLVM AOT on Windows from @lateralusX #92365
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix error message printed if there's a missing context for get runtime delegate call in hostfxr #92364
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Properly handle debugger-enumerating interior pointers and enregistered refs #92360
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fixes for LLVM AOT on Windows from @lateralusX #92356
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • remove test exclusion #92355
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI test #92354
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix SIMD+EH check #92348
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Mono]: Add missing case for constrained gsharedvt call. #92347
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by array schema #92337
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by value type schema #92334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92325
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Set the HAVE_FUNCTIONAL_PTHREAD_ROBUST_MUTEXES_EXITCOD value to 0 #92324
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix some assert's errors for ARM64-LoongArch64-RISCV64. #92319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Replace Riscv with RiscV #92318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #92316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move Native AOT outerloop tests to their own pipeline #91684
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-rc2][wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #92353
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Properly handle debugger-enumerating interior pointers and enregistered refs #92313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [release/8.0] Fix wasi build. #92368
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Fix invalid containment of vector broadcasts #92333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use Utf8JsonWriterCache in JsonNode.To{Json}String #92358
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92315
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the assert for BlendVariable #92183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] porting DATAS change back to RC2 #92323
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Set severity of rule CA1870 to warning #92135
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add tests for indexing by object schema #92268
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono]: Add missing case for constrained gsharedvt call. #92338
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [release/8.0] Events for IL methods without IL headers #92317
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix downlevel build break in TensorPrimitives #92269
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #92298
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi] Fix llvm target triple. #92256
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix trimming of DebuggerDisplay with Name #92191
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [QUIC] Throw ODE if connection/listener is disposed #92215
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid unnecessary array allocation in JsonHelpers.Utf8GetString on netstandard #92304
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Don't generate AddMask as it requires more explicit consideration of semantics #92308
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: add missing xarch RMW case #92293
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fix options Validation with objects have indexers #92311
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix options Validation with objects have indexers #92309
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Prevent restoring illink for native-binplace.proj #92289
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Disable new tests failing on NativeAOT #92388
    area-System.Linq
  • [RISC-V] Atomics #92102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add some convenience classes for node count JIT metrics, and automatic dumping from compShutdown #92112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Make a quirk in block morphing more explicit #92292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Build the PGO build legs through the global build job template #92296
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Add -skipcrossarchnative and -verbose options #90554

  • Change GetParametersNoCopy to GetParametersAsSpan and use it in a few more places #92310
    area-System.Reflection
  • Improve performance of BigInteger.Multiply(large, small) #92208
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Bump version to GA #92305
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699

  • [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92274
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0

    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

    area-Build-mono

    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Optimize JitStressOnly #91815

  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
